Articles.Content:
I went back to doing interior design in KSP. This is my Habitation Space Station (or it can be called Habitation Station for short). Inside the module, there are a number of things I placed in there. It includes a breakfast nook (refrigerator and coffee included), a bathroom (that command pod on the back end), sleeping quarters (which happen to be placed next to the bathroom), and a flat-screen TV (that I-beam with solar panels on it).

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/14HuG)

It wobbles around when launched, but I did manage to get it into orbit.

Craft file: [http://www./download/k2m7938aiqdikfc/Habitation_Space_Station.craft](http://www./download/k2m7938aiqdikfc/Habitation_Space_Station.craft)
That looks amazing, I've always wanted to make something like this!

> 
> That looks amazing, I've always wanted to make something like this!

Given the changes in the physics engine, I can only make narrow-sized modules. Previously, I had other ones like the Space Bar and the Space Lounge.
